name: hydrajs
description: Client side JavaScript library to interact with Hydra

scripts.test: npm run lint && ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --timeout 20000 --compilers ts:ts-node/register --ui bdd src/**/*.test.ts
scripts.patch-release: npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.pretest: if [[ -z "${HYDRA_HOSTNAME}" || -z "${RHN_USER}" || -z "${RHN_PASS}" ]]; then echo "Need set HYDRA_HOSTNAME, RHN_USER, RH_PASS"; exit 1; fi

author: Samuel Mendenhall <Samuel.Mendenhall@gmail.com> (https://github.com/engineersamuel)
